scripts.copy:dev-bundles: mkdir -p ../http-server/android ../http-server/ios && curl -o ../http-server/android/MicroApp.container.js.bundle 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/MicroApp.container.js.bundle' && curl -o ../http-server/android/MicroApp.container.js.bundle.map 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/MicroApp.container.js.bundle.map' && curl -o ../http-server/android/mf-manifest.json 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/mf-manifest.json' && curl -o ../http-server/android/mf-stats.json 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/mf-stats.json' && curl -o ../http-server/android/__federation_expose_SimpleComponent.chunk.bundle 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/__federation_expose_SimpleComponent.chunk.bundle' && curl -o ../http-server/android/__federation_expose_SimpleComponent.chunk.bundle.map 'http://127.0.0.1:8085/android/__federation_expose_SimpleComponent.chunk.bundle.map'
scripts.serve:dev-bundles: npm run copy:dev-bundles && cd ../http-server && node server.js
